ygData.subject: Follow up........
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, just thought I d take a moment and give you all a quick follow up on the theft of Tani s armor.  Thanks again for all your support in this. Basically,
ygData.messageBody:
Well, just thought I'd take a moment and give you all a quick follow up on
the theft of Tani's armor. Thanks again for all your support in this.

Basically, the GMs did nothing. I was asked to write the head GM on our
server an email to which she has not yet responded (been 5 days). I have
pretty much given up hope that they will take any action at all. While the
theft of the items was the direct result of a poor decision on my part, the
lore bag of items poofing was a bug and I'm a little disappointed that I
have not even received a response from the GMs.

Anyway, I had Halana camp for the items again, got most of them. Then a
friend decided he wasn't going to play his twinked bard anymore and gave me
most of his lambent items. All I need to replace now are an offhand
weapon, shoulder, back and sleeve items.

Soooooo... if there are any young bards on Sol Ro who would like a piece or
two of lambent (sleeves, gloves and legs I believe), drop me an email or
send me a tell in game cuz i have extras :)

Thanks again for all your support!

Tani 20th (no longer nekkid) Bard
Halana 50th (don't go to the planes if you dislike arguments) Shaman
Solusek Ro

Wendy Lynn Cranfill
Maxtor Corporation


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
